about.bio: I am a first-year undergraduate student in Environmental Science and Disaster Management, passionate about sustainability, climate action, and technical writing. I am eager to learn about environmental challenges and how disaster management can protect communities. I enjoy simplifying complex ideas into clear messages and aim to grow as a professional who can contribute to a safer, greener future.
